name: Beta

name: Beta 1.1
Subtitle: A random update that should have been always at the start
Description: -Money is now in k, m insted of 1_000, 1_000_000... -Worker btns now looks decent -Now insted of taking immidietly a loan (when the player has negative money) it takes to the bank -fixed workers price -Added images to the workers

name: Beta 1.1.1
Subtitle: Preperation for the preperation of Beta 1.2
Description: -Creation of the game blackjack (but an actual game not just a btn) -Bug fixes

name: Beta 1.1.2
Subtitle: Prep for Bata 1.2
Description: -Bug fixes -Added a better font -Added two more games -Better bankrupt system -Upgrade for the change logs -Better navegation for people using a mobile device

Subtitle: Finishing touches for Beta 1.1
Description: -Bug fixes -Finished the images in the btns -The casino games now work for mobile -The amount to pay and prize in the casino games now changes depending of the players money (kinda like how to loans works) -Better money formator
